betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oCrop sticks can be used to duplicate or improve crops.

Only plants placed on crop sticks can be improved. Crops have three stats: growth, gain and strength. All stats have a level ranging from 1 to 10.

All planted crops start at level 1/1/1, and become much better when levelled to 10/10/10. 

If you right click crop sticks with crop sticks, you make crossing crop sticks.

If crossing crop sticks are placed next to planted crop sticks, the plant will spread, sharing its stats.

If two or more planted crops are placed around double crop sticks, the resulting plant may come out with better stats.

The seed analyzer can be used to look at a given plant's stats. 

If you want to challenge yourself with some boolean logic, integrated dynamics can be used to automate the process of making 10/10/10 seeds.
